description: This file defines a self-evaluation workflow for content creation and review, involving agents and feedback mechanisms, using classes and methods to orchestrate the process.

classes.name: Feedback
classes.description: Data model for feedback containing content, feedback text, and score.

classes.name: SelfEvaluationWorkflow
classes.description: Workflow class that manages content creation and review for self-evaluation.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the self-evaluation process by creating content, reviewing it, and iterating based on feedback.
